Test 1: Type Conversion
float 00000000000000000000000000000000 is converted into sfp 0000000000000000
float 00110000011111111000000000000000 is converted into sfp 0000000111111111
sfp 0000000000000000 is converted into float 00000000000000000000000000000000
sfp 0000000111111111 is converted into float 00110000011111111000000000000000
Test 2: Addition
0000000000000000 + 0000000111111111 = 0000000111111111
Test 3: Multiplication
0000000000000000 * 0000000111111111 = 0000000000000000
